Body:
log_record = MagicMock()
content = MagicMock()
content.decode.side_effect = exception
response = MagicMock(url='https://ovalmoney.com', headers=None, encoding=
    encoding, content=content)
decorate_log_response(log_record, response)
content.decode.assert_called_with(expected_encoding, errors='strict')
assert log_record.response_body == '<RAW Data>'
pytest.mark.parametrize('exception,encoding,expected_encoding', [(TypeError,
    None, 'utf-8'), (UnicodeDecodeError, None, 'utf-8'), (LookupError,
    'UtF8', 'UtF8')])
